Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: The Right Wing government decided to give a decoration to those who were called " Prisoners of mandatory rule", the members of the Lehi and Etzel who were imprisoned in Africa.
